artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunimasa; Publisher: Uemura Yohei
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: print of female figure in white checkered robe with red collar; hand touching black sheathed sword resting over PL shoulder; looking to LL; white kerchief on head; green and black object in background; framed
markings: Seals at L: censor seal: [kiwame 極]; publisher\'s seal: [Ueyo 上世]; UL: unidentified red collector\'s seal
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Kaeribana yuki mo Yoshitsune, performed at the Minato Theater, 1795, 11th month
title: Actor Nakamura Noshio II as Gotobei's Wife Tokujo
